cab.content: SECRET.BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 30th APRIL 1918.1. As the result of a counter-attack delivered yesterday afternoon, the French recaptured LOCRE HOSPICE, and drove the enemy back from HYDE PARK CORKER, (the junction of roads in the neck between MONT ROUSE and the SCHERPEHBERG)s to the low ground west of BRULOOZS.,2* Further north the British maintained their line intact throughout the day,A3, The enemy ha3 not renewed hi3 attacks this morningc4a on the rest of the front there is nothing of special interest to reportsGeneral Staff.War Office, S.W.1, 30th April, 1918.Issued at 12.10 p,m.Fop ths personal information of the Minister only. -
